description.para: Interrupts the blocked thread (Sleep, Join, Wait etc.).

tr.td: Function succeeds in interrupting the blocked thread.

remarks.para: This method interrupts the blocked thread (Sleep, Join, Wait etc.) to wake up and continue running.

If the thread is not in Sleep, Join or Wait state while the method is being called, then the thread is interrupted as soon as it becomes block state. If the thread has finished, then this method has no effect and returns E_FAIL. If the thread is in a non-interruptable sleeping state, then method does nothing. If the thread is in running list, then the method sets its state as RunningReason_WakeUp.
